text:
Table showing the Average Weight, Height, and Circumference
of Head and Chest of Boys!!]

At birth Weight 7% pounds.
Height 20% inches.
Chest 13% inches.
Head 14 inches.

Height 29 inches.
Chest 18 inches.
Head 18 inches.

Height 32% inches.
